#include <iostream>
#include<stack>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main() {
    int x[1001][1001]={0};
    int n,m,k,a,b,i;
    stack<int> s;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&k);
    while(m>0){
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
        x[a][b]=1;
        m--;
    }
    int yy=n;
    int xx=0;
    int t;
    for(int j=1;j<=n;j++){
        xx=0;
        int visited[1001]={0};
        visited[j]=1;
        xx++;
        s.push(j);
        while(!s.empty()){
            t=s.top();
            i=1;
            while(i<=n&&(x[t][i]==0||visited[i]==1)){
                i++;
            }
            if(i<=n){
                s.push(i);
                visited[i]=1;
                xx++;
            }
            else{
                s.pop();
            }
        }
        if(yy>xx){
            yy=xx;
        }
    }
    printf("%d",k*yy);
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
